name: Black Diamond Stinger Crampons
description: Lightweight stainless steel crampons for tackling serious ice and mixed lines on winter crags and alpine faces. An asymmetrical design fits the contour of modern mountaineering boots, and thin, low-profile heel and toe wires offer a secure fit for less weight.Made of lightweight stainless steel that won’t rust.Mono front point can be cheaply replaced and changed on the fly.Hooded front point and aggressive secondary points facilitate technical footwork.Thin, low-profile toe bail.Shorter heel wire for improved fit with modern boots.Front and rear dual-density ABS included.
